page.title: 15Notton Gala
page.content: On Sunday I went to Notton Gala.There were lots of stalls like the coconut shy.It all started with the parade. You could be a clown and I was one.I had my hair sprayed red and blue.The clowns had to walk down to the green after the brass band.When we were half way down it started to rain.Maria won a game because she was the best clown. I had to go home to get changed because I was wet. My mum was helping with a marble game.I won 20p on game.You had to find the whole egg and I did.My dad helped too.He won a coconut and we haven't finished eating it yet.
